function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of respiratory isolation facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious spread of mycobacterium tuberculosis through airborne droplets","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dormant tuberculosis bacteria causing disease years after initial infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Drug-resistant tuberculosis requiring prolonged and challenging treatment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of drug-resistant m. tuberculosis strains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resurgence of tuberculosis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission in healthcare settings and resource-limited settings","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to untreated air from an hiv-tb ward","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of infectious particles in the air","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air circulation in the ward","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Upper-room uv lights and negative air ionization might not be effective at preventing airborne tuberculosis transmission in humans.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information dissemination on tuberculosis prevention and control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control in healthcare settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to integrated hiv and tuberculosis information","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aumento significativo da curva epidemiol\\u00f3gica devido \\u00e0 pandemia da covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concentra\\u00e7\\u00e3o das iniciativas de ado\\u00e7\\u00e3o de tecnologia em locais historicamente favor\\u00e1veis \\u00e0 inova\\u00e7\\u00e3o","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ado\\u00e7\\u00e3o de tecnologia digital na otimiza\\u00e7\\u00e3o dos servi\\u00e7ose segue uma tend\\u00eancia mundial","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aumento significativo de la curva epidemiol\\u00f3gica en brasilia","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adopci\\u00f3n de tecnolog\\u00eda digital en el 83% de las ciudades encuestadas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spread of contagious diseases in smart cities due to lack of effective monitoring and interpretation of health-related data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate management of urban mobility and connections between individuals, leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to consolidate public policies and administrative actions during periods of declining disease curve, leading to complacency and inadequate preparedness for future outbreaks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of technology may not have followed or preceded the predicted growth of the infection curve, impacting the effectiveness of response to the pandemic situation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of technology may have been a response after the rise of the infection curves in the cities, leading to a speed of response driven by the immediacy-led demands of the faced situation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of digital tools by public management may have challenges in implementation and adaptation of activities, particularly in the context of isolation measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilizing big data and technology may lead to privacy and data security risks, especially in the context of a pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying heavily on digital solutions may exacerbate the digital divide and marginalize vulnerable populations who lack access to technology.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The rapid deployment of technology without proper testing and validation may lead to errors in decision-making and resource allocation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of digitized information for pandemic response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of drones for mobility and surveillance actions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High population density in urban areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital tooling for data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Under-notification of cases may lead to distorted results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Geographic distribution may contribute to contagion in densely populated areas","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low technology adoption in certain regions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital exclusion in underprivileged regions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of digital tools for healthcare support","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transposition of activities to virtual platforms may not optimize public administration activities, but only digitize processes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simple replacement of physical activities with digital processes may be a shallow level of technological impact.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on telephone exchange as a communication strategy may be anachronistic compared to digital devices.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of smartphones for monitoring urban agglomerations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of digital in cities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal distribution of wealth and resources leading to socioeconomic disparities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of digital tools in areas with higher socioeconomic development","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of digital initiatives for health and education support","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity between health support strategies and cities with better history of
